trans-unit.source: Defines the entry point to be called when the application loads. Generally this is set either to the main form in your application or to the 'Main' procedure that should run when the application starts. Class libraries do not define an entry point.
trans-unit.target: Defines the entry point to be called when the application loads. Generally this is set either to the main form in your application or to the 'Main' procedure that should run when the application starts. Class libraries do not define an entry point.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of .NET that the application targets. This option can have different values depending on which versions of .NET are installed on your computer.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of .NET that the application targets. This option can have different values depending on which versions of .NET are installed on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Selects a manifest generation option when the application runs on Windows Vista or later under User Account Control (UAC). Options include a default manifest, no manifest, or a custom manifest provided by your project. Note you must specify the icon and manifest -or- a resource file.
trans-unit.target: Selects a manifest generation option when the application runs on Windows Vista or later under User Account Control (UAC). Options include a default manifest, no manifest, or a custom manifest provided by your project. Note you must specify the icon and manifest -or- a resource file.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of application to build.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the type of application to build.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the project's application settings and properties.
Sets the .ico file that you want to use as your program icon. Note you must specify the icon and manifest -or- a resource file.
trans-unit.target: Sets the .ico file that you want to use as your program icon. Note you must specify the icon and manifest -or- a resource file.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the output file that will hold the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the output file that will hold the assembly manifest.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the base namespace for files added to the project.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the base namespace for files added to the project.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a resource file for the project. Note you must specify the icon and manifest -or- a resource file.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a resource file for the project. Note you must specify the icon and manifest -or- a resource file.
